results.title: Effects of metformin on atrial and ventricular arrhythmias: evidence from cell to patient
results.text_hl: For @DISEASE_Arrhythmias_Cardiac @DISEASE_MESH:D001145 @@@ventricular arrhythmias@@@, in vivo reports demonstrated that activation of 5' adenosine monophosphate-activated protein kinase and phosphorylated @GENE_GJA1 @GENE_2697 @@@connexin-43@@@ by @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ played a key role in @<m>DISEASE_Brain_Ischemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002545 @@@ischemic@@@ @DISEASE_Arrhythmias_Cardiac @DISEASE_MESH:D001145 @@@ventricular arrhythmias@@@ reduction.

results.title: Effect of metformin in a novel experimental model of peripheral artery disease.
results.text_hl: Other outcomes included treadmill performance and molecular changes in the @<m>DISEASE_Brain_Ischemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002545 @@@ischemic@@@ limb. @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ improved hind limb blood supply (p<0.001), but not physical performance, associated with increased phosphorylation of 5' adenosine monophosphate-activated protein kinase and endothelial nitric oxide synthase (p<0.05), reduced expression of @GENE_TXNIP @GENE_56338 @@@thioredoxin interacting protein@@@ (p<0.05) and increased expression of @GENE_PPARGC1A @GENE_19017 @@@peroxisome proliferator-activated receptor gamma coactivator 1-alpha@@@ (p<0.05) in the @<m>DISEASE_Brain_Ischemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002545 @@@ischemic@@@ muscles and increased circulating @CHEMICAL_Nitric_Oxide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009569 @@@nitric oxide@@@ levels (p<0.05).

citations.NLM: Krishna S, Moxon JV, Kraeuter AK, Golledge J. Effect of metformin in a novel experimental model of peripheral artery disease. Clin Sci (Lond). 2025 Apr 30;():. PMID: 40304545
citations.BibTeX: @article{40304545, title={Effect of metformin in a novel experimental model of peripheral artery disease.}, author={Krishna S and Moxon JV and Kraeuter AK and Golledge J}, journal={Clin Sci (Lond)}}
